verses.name: Psalms 119:172
verses.text: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 119:173
verses.text: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.

verses.name: Psalms 119:174
verses.text: I have longed for thy salvation, O Lord; and thy law is my delight.

verses.name: Psalms 119:175
verses.text: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.

verses.name: Psalms 119:176
verses.text: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
